quote: Love those you hate you.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina

quote: It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.
author: Confucius

quote: I don't hate you.. I just don't like that you exist
author: Gena Showalter,  Seduce the Darkness

quote: If you want to forget something or someone, never hate it, or never hate him/her. Everything and everyone that you hate is engraved upon your heart; if you want to let go of something, if you want to forget, you cannot hate.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: you have to love something before you can hate it.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Last Song

quote: Hating hurts the hater the most. Hating is not a salve for the wounded soul, it is an abrasive that keeps the soul wounded and raw and oversensitive.
author: Jack R. Rose

quote: Dislike in yourself what you dislike in others.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: Hate is... It's too easy. Love. Love takes courage.
author: Hannah Harrington,  Speechless

quote: When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Invisible Monsters

quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: The opposite of love is not hate. It is indifference.
author: Christopher Pike,  Black Blood

quote: Before you hate something you should try to understand it.
author: Martha Grimes,  Dakota

quote: It's easy to hate and point out everything that is wrong with the world; it is the hardest and most important work in one's life to free oneself from the bonds of fear and attachment.
author: Noah Levine,  Dharma Punx: A Memoir

quote: Hate looks like everybody else until it smiles
author: Tahereh Mafi

quote: Hatred is a Simple Child Hatred is a simple child nurtured and coddled in a raging heart and then released into a crowd of innocents wearing a suicide vest.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Got Hate? When a hater cozily whispers shit in your ear about them,what does that say about you?
author: Beryl Dov

quote: What is it you most dislike? Stupidity, especially in its nastiest forms of racism and superstition.
author: Christopher Hitchens,  Hitch-22: A Memoir

quote: Do not hate the player, nor the game...rule it!
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Everything with me is either worship and passion or pity and understanding. I hate rarely, though when I hate, I hate murderously. For example now, I hate the bank and everything connected with it. I also hate Dutch paintings, penis-sucking, parties, and cold rainy weather. But I am much more preoccupied with loving.
author: Anaïs Nin,  Henry and June: From "A Journal of Love"--The Unexpurgated Diary of Anaïs Nin

quote: To hate others is ugly.To hate yourself is uglier.
author: Hlovate,  Rooftop Rant

quote: What is Hate? [10w] Hate is merely love hiding behind the mask of envy.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I don't believe in hate. To me it wastes too much time. People who hate waste so much of their life hating that they miss out on all the other stuff out here.
author: Jaycee Dugard,  A Stolen Life

quote: The dupe of friendship, and the fool of love; have I not reason to hate and to despise myself? Indeed I do; and chiefly for not having hated and despised the world enough.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Hate the sin, love the sinner.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: ...the opposite of love is not hate -- it's apathy. It's not giving a damn. If somebody hates me, they must "feel"something ... or they couldn't possibly hate. Therefore, there's some way in which I can get to them.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: And where love ends, hate begins
author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina

quote: Do what you love or die a slow death doing what you hate
author: Sonya Watson

quote: You know, you don't have to have permanent opinions. You can think, every morning, 'I love the world' and go to bed every night thinking, 'I hate the world.'
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I think what motivates people is not great hate, but great love for other people.
author: Huey Newton

quote: Hate [10w] Love cannot hate eradicate ~only a more ruthless hate can.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: There is greatness in doing something you hate for the sake of someone you love.
author: Shmuley Boteach

quote: In the present case it is a little inaccurate to say I hate everything. I am strongly in favor of common sense, common honesty and common decency. This makes me forever ineligible to any public office of trust or profit in the Republic. But I do not repine, for I am a subject of it only by force of arms.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: Hate is nothing when weighed against survival. (Valentine)
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes

quote: Hatred is a louder exhibition of inability.
author: Qaisar Iqbal Janjua

quote: Hatred is a form of faith, distilled by passion to remove all rationality.
author: L.E. Modesitt Jr.,  The Elysium Commission

quote: Principled hate is a hell of a lot stronger than "Boy, I wish you hadn't mummified me and thrown me into the lake"hate.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: I love you more than I hate everything else.
author: Rainbow Rowell,  Landline

quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
author: André Gide,  Autumn Leaves

quote: Isn't it funny.I'm enjoying my hatred so much more than i ever enjoyed love. Love is temperamental. Tiring. It makes demands. Love uses you, changes its mind. But hatred, now, that's something you can use. Sculpt. Wield. It's hard, or soft, however you need it. Love humiliates you, but Hatred cradles you.
author: Janet Fitch,  White Oleander

quote: I have decided to stick to love...Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.,  A Testament of Hope: The Essential Writings and Speeches

quote: Isn't hate merely the result of wounded love?
author: Amy Tan,  The Joy Luck Club

quote: Never hate an enemy; love them and transform them into a friend.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: My only love sprung from my only hate!Too early seen unknown, and known too late!Prodigious birth of love it is to me,That I must love a loathed enemy.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I hate you' she said to me one afternoon. 'I really, really hate you.' Call me sensitive, but I couldn't help but take it personally.
author: David Sedaris,  Me Talk Pretty One Day

quote: Hate. Huh. He'd never hated himself. If anything, he'd always liked himself a little too much. Once, a human female had even accused him of picturing his own face while he climaxed. He hadn't denied it, either, and next time he'd slept with her, he'd made sure to scream, "Strider"at the pivotal moment."--Strider, keeper of the demon of Defeat--
author: Gena Showalter,  The Darkest Secret

quote: Live for the lovers, not the haters!
author: Scylar Tyberius,  Sebastian the Great

quote: Smile! Accept hatred with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Ignore all hatred and criticism. Live for what you create, and die protecting it.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: I hate you, God. I hate you as though you actually exist.
author: Graham Greene,  The End of the Affair
